reviewText: This is another excellent special edition DVD from Distribpix on a major film from Radley Metzger/Henry Paris. The original harcore film is in pristine condition and uncut, with the controversial urination scene from C.D. Laing and the bondage scene with Constance Money and Jamie Gillis. The softcore edition adds to the charm of the project and the DVD, as well as good extras, like a short featurette on the making of "Barbara Broadcast". An excellent DVD overall.
One of the best true classics. With a plot and theme. Not heard of anymore. A true must for the collector of hardcore movies with a plot.
Adult films were so much better when this one was produced. The transfer to DVD is superb. If you want to watch an adult film that has class, then you should get this one.
I picked this rating because it was good not great but not bad either. I like the movie and had it once before.
The collector's edition highlights the excellent cinematography of Radley Metzger. Porn is not always erotic, but this movie certainly is. The best fellatio scene ever filmed.
